    Results - Class in com.swiftfox.scheduler
    A utility class that analyzes a GanttChart to compute metrics such as waiting time and turnaround time for each Process.
    Results(GanttChart) - Constructor for class com.swiftfox.scheduler.Results
    Constructs a Results instance and computes the process metrics from the given GanttChart.
